name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized RDP Access Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident of unauthorized access via RDP, which led to file exfiltration and ransomware deployment.

action--e0d17c42-f8f6-4d62-af0b-d463ae2a.name: Disconnect unauthorized RDP sessions
action--e0d17c42-f8f6-4d62-af0b-d463ae2a.description: Terminate any unauthorized RDP sessions detected on the network.

commands.command: net session | findstr /C:"<USERNAME>" | for /F "tokens=2" %i in ('findstr "<HOSTNAME>"') do logoff %i

action--75d5b946-ef39-4a71-8c1b-f05c02e0.name: Change RDP port and enforce strong passwords
action--75d5b946-ef39-4a71-8c1b-f05c02e0.description: Adjust RDP settings to enhance security following unauthorized access.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name='RDP Change Port' protocol=TCP dir=in localport=<NEW_PORT> action=allow

action--4e67d729-c938-4632-acc5-912a1a16.name: Run security scans on affected hosts
action--4e67d729-c938-4632-acc5-912a1a16.description: Continue scanning the affected hosts until they're clean.

while-condition--f0f2e3ff-c37a-4d57-b004.name: Poll for scan status
while-condition--f0f2e3ff-c37a-4d57-b004.description: Repeat scanning until the scan is clean.
